name: gdr-node
description: Progetto con l'obiettivo di sviluppare un GDR con node/koa

scripts.prisma:dev: npm run prisma:migrate:dev --name latest && npm run prisma:generate
scripts.prisma:populate: cat ./prisma/export/db.sql | docker exec -i corso_its_db psql -U corso_its_db -d corso_its_db
scripts.prisma:docker:migrate: docker compose -f 'docker-compose.yml' up -d --build 'corso_its_db' && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate:dev --name latest && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml down -v
scripts.dev: npm run prisma:migrate:dev && npm run prisma:generate && npx prisma db seed && npx tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.test: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up --build && npx prisma migrate dev --name latest
